p: Overall, the nexus between microfinance and SDGs clearly arises. Access to finance and – most importantly – access to microfinance, emerge today as primary needs and effective strategies for embarking on sustainable development. Adding to this, the empowerment of the vulnerable categories as a focal human development mandate emerges. These strategies are strengthened by the fact that the foreseen new development strategy passes through the enforcement of resilience policies to combat the threats of worldwide major adverse events and poverty, offering enhanced capability. Research, policymaking and practice will follow the designed path.
